name: Basic Craft
effect: _Prepare_ 2 _Essence_.

boosts.name: Hand Signs
boosts.effect: You may only use this _Boost_ if you have a _Free Hand_. Instead, _Prepare_ 3.

name: Run
effect: Gain X _Temporary_ _Movement_.

name: Raise Guard
effect: Gain _Guarding_. While _Guarding_ in this way, gain +1 _Guard_.

name: Disengage
effect: Add [_Safe_] to your _Movement_ this _Turn_.

name: Rally
effect:
Choose X. You may repeat the same option:
* You or the Target _Recovers_.
* You or the Target clears 4 _Stun_.
* _Prepare_ 2 _Momentum_.

name: Catch Breath
effect: Clear 2X _Stun_. You Spirit may clear 3Y _Stun_.

name: Grit Teeth
effect: Reduce your _Stun_ by 3, or 5 if you _Lost_. You may trigger this before or after resolving the triggering effect.

name: Quick Step
effect: You may move to a new _Position_ within your _Arena_; choose one enemy; they treat this _Movement_ as [_Safe_].

boosts.name: Tumble
boosts.effect: Instead, this is [_Safe_] against all Targets.

name: Perfect Guard
effect: The triggering Attack is [_Glancing_].

name: Opportunity Attack
trigger: A hostile creature at your _Position_ creates an _Opening_.
effect: Use a Single-Target Attack [_Discount_ 2] against the triggering creature.

name: Lethal Blow
effect: Deal 3 _Bonus_ _Damage_.

name: Guard Breaker
effect: Add _Break_ [_Focus_] to the triggering Attack or deal +5 _Bonus Stun_.

name: Find Advantage
effect: Add _Exposed_/_Impaired_ and 2 _Stun_ to the original Attack, even if it was a _Miss_.

boosts.name: Flowing Combo
boosts.effect: _Prepare_ 1 on the Attack used for this Gambit. You may repeat this _Boost_ up to twice.

name: Sidestep
trigger: You are Attacked and are not _Immobile_.
effect:
_Defend_. Gain +1 Reflex. Reduce the Damage by the _Movement_ spent.
* _Tie_: Instead reduce the damage by your _Reflex_ plus the _Movement_ spent.
* _Win_: Instead reduce the damage by your _Reflex_ plus twice the _Movement_ spent.

boosts.name: Roll
boosts.effect: After resolving this Reaction, reduce the triggering Attack's result by one tier (making a _Hit_ a _Graze_, for example). If the _Defend_ was a _Loss_, gain _Prone_.

name: Use Environment
effect: Resolve the Interaction effect of a piece of _Terrain_ within Range, paying its listed _Cost_.

name: Drop
effect: Stop _Wielding_ a piece of _Equipment_, placing it unused in your _Arena_.

boosts.name: Drop Belt
boosts.effect: Instead remove an _Equipped_ piece of _Equipment_, placing it unused in your _Arena_.

boosts.name: Drop Pack
boosts.effect: Create an [_Opening_] and instead remove your _Pack_, placing it unused in your _Arena_.

name: Draw/Stow
effect: _Wield_ an _Equipped_ Item, or _Equip_ a  _Wielded_ Item.

boosts.name: Retrieve
boosts.effect: Create an [_Opening_]. Instead _Wield_ or _Equip_ an _Unattended_ piece of _Equipment_ within _Melee_ Range.

boosts.name: Trade
boosts.effect: Choose an ally within _Melee_ _Range_. They may immediately _Wield_ or _Equip_ an Item you have _Wielded_ or _Equipped_, or vice versa.

name: Manifest
effect:
Choose one:
* _Summon_ your _Spirit_ to a valid _Position_ within Range.
* _Recall_ your _Spirit_.

name: Combination Strike
effect: Your Spirit may immediately use a Single-Target Attack [_Discount_ 2] against the same Target.

name: Interdiction
effect: You and your Spirit are both targeted by the triggering effect, but take half Damage/_Stun_ each and _Negate_ with _Advantage_.
